body.name: Multifunction Magic Broom, Squeegee Broom for Floor, Rubber Broom, Silicone Broom for Floor Cleaning, Magic Broom Sweeper for Living Room, Kitchen, Bathroom-Easy Dry The Glass (Orange, 54 INCH)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 6 mins
features: 🧹VERSATILE, EFFICIENT, EASY-TO-USE: The Magic Broom is the perfect tool for cleaning up all sorts of messes, including broken glass, spilled liquids, fine dust, coffee grounds, sugar, and pet and human hair. This Magic Broom for floor can even easily sweep away sticky substances like ketchup and cracked eggs. This magic broom not only allows you to clean those hard-to-reach areas while protecting your wrists from pain, but also easily cleans up bathroom water puddles and kitchen grease.

🧹CLEANS ON MANY SURFACES: The upgraded magic broom sweeper is a multi-functional cleaning tool that is perfect for cleaning carpets, rugs, floors, living rooms, kitchens, hard floors, tiles, swimming pools, garages, and bathrooms. The rubber broom can also be used as a window squeegee for cleaning and spraying glass surfaces.

🧹UNIQUE SILICONE EDGE: Unlike ordinary brooms, this magic broom will never have dirty and unsanitary bristles. The specially designed silicone edge of the broom generates static electricity, which is used to attract hair and fine dust. It effectively cleans every corner and crevice of the house. Made of high-density PP material, this magic broom is not afraid of soaking and is easy to clean. It is noise-free and does not leave scratches.

🧹ERGONOMIC DESIGN AND UPGRADED LENGTH: The ergonomic design of the magic sweeper broom allows for easy and comfortable use. With an upgraded length of 53 inches, there is no need to bend over while sweeping, and high places can be easily reached without the use of additional tools. Additionally, the magic broom head features a 45° bevel on one side, making it effortless to remove dirt and hair from hard-to-reach corners.

🧹WIDE RANGE OF APPLICATIONS: The magic sweeper broom has a wide range of applications, making it perfect for cleaning tasks in the living room, kitchen, tile, glass, hardwood floors, bathroom, garage, windows, and more. Suitable for children, boys, girls, youth, adults, and the elderly, it also makes for a great gift for friends and family. Note: It is just a handy broom tool and can't be pressed the rod very hard when using it. Or it will come loose easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST BROOM EVER
reviews.reviewText: Did not know I could get so excited about me Broom. However, this particular broom is so easy, lightweight, and nothing gets by it, not a single dog hair or crumb or piece of dirt. It easily and completely eradicates everything from our floors. I’m gifting them to my daughter-in-law and a couple friends friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for Dog Hair and Spills on Floors
reviews.reviewText: I have hardwood flooring in my house along with three large dogs. Needless to say, there is always dog hair on the floor. I’ve been sweeping and vacuuming daily, but I always find more the second I’m finished. This squeegee broom does better than the stick vac or broom. The rubber edge of the broom slides across the floor, giving no room for any hair to escape its path. It moves all the hair, as well as dust and dirt, right into my dustpan.To test it and prove to myself it’s working better, I used the broom one day, then mopped. On the second day, I used the squeegee broom. On both days, I emptied the mop water in the sink to see how much hair would be in the sink strainer. There was less hair on the second day.I don’t think there’s ever going to be a solution that’ll get rid of all loose dog hair, but this squeegee broom definitely does a better job than my regular bristled broom. The only downside is the squeegee broom isn’t flexible. It won’t go into tighter places and I can’t use it to dust baseboards as I do with the broom.Overall, I like the squeegee broom for getting up dog hair. I got to use it on a spill the other day too, and I loved it for that. It’s a useful addition to my collection of vacs, stick vacs, and brooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy cleanup on carpet and tile
reviews.reviewText: I love this broom. I have two cats and a little dog, so there is always something to sweep up. The cat hair has a tendency to “fly” away from other brooms or dustpans but this broom seems to crab it while sweeping so it stays together when swept up. I like it.I have also swept up pet vomit with this and it worked well. I’m curious if the squeegee blade with hold up getting used on carpet on a regular basis.Assembly, when the product first arrived, was super easy. The pieces all screw together to form the stick/handle. I have even used this on my shower (after taking a few pieces off) to clean the glass stall door.Cleaning the squeegee off is super easy as well. So far, I would highly recommend this, but I would like it in a less bright color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works OK, but handle is flimsy other than that it would be a great little tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Multi-use broom for a low price
reviews.reviewText: I got this to help get dog hair out of the carpet. Although it WORKS for that it requires a lot of effort and small movements to get anything additional out of the carpet that the vacuum didn't grab. It's just too much effort for me to do more often than when my inlaws visit.I did end up really liking this for my tile and hardwood floors though. Unlike a traditional broom, this squeegee broom doesn't kick up dust and hair as much. It's a lot easier to control where the dirt and dust pile is going. My grout for my tile isn't really deep either, although if you did have deeper grout you might have issues getting into that area.There's areas of my floor that have caked-on dust because they're just hard to get to. This broom does a pretty good job of almost wiping that off as it goes (likely because it's stiffer than a standard broom).I imagine that it'll be good for glass and mirrors but my house doesn't really have those in areas that are too out of reach for me.Four stars for the price. If it was any more expensive, I would knock this down to three. The build on it feels a bit cheap but it's lightweight and once it's put together it holds up fine (so far).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works decent with texture
reviews.reviewText: Love this thing. Way easier to clean than a normal broom. Gets almost anything. Even decent with textured vinyl floors. Light weight. Easy to use. Better than regular brooms. I would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for mopping
reviews.reviewText: This rubber broom is very handy for my screened in porch. When it rains I can easily squeegie the water out the door. It was easy to assemble and feels like it's pretty good quality. Its a handy tool to have around the house.
